DOC.brief_summary: A prospective clinical evaluation effectiveness Ovation Alto Abdominal Stent Graft System use treatment subject abdominal aortic aneurysm ( AAA ) .
DOC.brief_title: Expanding Patient Applicability With Polymer Sealing Ovation Alto Stent Graft IDE ( Investigational Device Exemption ) Study
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective clinical evaluation effectiveness Ovation Alto Abdominal Stent Graft System use treatment subject abdominal aortic aneurysm ( AAA ) . The primary objective evaluate treatment success 12 month Ovation Alto Abdominal Stent Graft system . The study 15 site , 75 patient base attrition rate . The follow-up interval 1 , 6 , 12 month follow initial implant procedure .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria include : 1 . Patient adequate iliac/femoral access compatible require delivery system . 2 . Patient nonaneurysmal proximal aortic neck . 3 . Patient nonaneurysmal distal iliac land zone . Exclusion Criteria include : 1 . Patient dissect aneurysm . 2 . Patient acutely rupture aneurysm . 3 . Patient need emergent surgery .
